title: Drawing, "Design for Desk Lamp", ca. 1920s
medium: Graphite on tracing paper,  ruled border in graphite along upper and lower edges
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower right margin: #309 / DWG #527311 - LAMP / DONALD DESKEY / 145 W. 57h ST.; at center right; TUBE BULB; at lower right:1/16 SHEET METAL; at lower margin: 309; dimensions throughout
description: Drawing of desk lamp, showing profile (below), plan (above), and perspective views (center, right). Profile view in the form of "2," plan in form of narrow oval, perspective view in scroll form and shaded to suggest curve.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Desk Lamp", ca. 1920s.
ca. 1920s. Graphite on tracing paper,  ruled border in graphite along upper and lower edges. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-230.
